data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,666,900 souls living in the county of Khagaria with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Khagaria, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 18,336 believers in the county of Khagaria the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Khagaria.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Khagaria.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Nagarchi (Muslim traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, help the fearful in Khagaria, Bihar, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 18,336 believers in the county of Khagaria.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Khagaria, Bihar, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

location.name: Khagaria
location.people_groups_list: Rajbhar, Beg, Aoghar, Mukeri, Rajput Barwar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajbhar (73,000), Beg (3,100), Aoghar (100), Mukeri (32,000), Rajput Barwar (63,000)
